channel.title: 614 npc drops and spawning
channel.description:
Title says it all.
I need to add drops for bandos boss, all barrows brothers & tormented demon.
Is there any chance someone could tell me how to add the npc into the server & make them drop items?
*Note* Do not flame me for this help I currently do know what a 614 is if you will go look at mine and troys 614 release on the downloads section.*
[size=24pt]Yes I do have npc combat[/size]

item.title: 614 npc drops and spawning
item.dc:creator: @Ecstacy_Pkz Ecstacy Pkz
item.description:
@Ecstacy_Pkz wrote:

Adding NPCâ€™s:

Files Modified: Npc.cfg
Here is the proper way to add an NPC

npc	=	*NPCID*	*COORDX*     *COORDY*	0

Read full topic
